titles.title: Applauding organizations that engage in the prevention of domestic violence and provide outreach and support services for victims.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 7/31/2008--Introduced. Applauds the efforts of Sanctuary for Families, the New York City Family Justice Center in Brooklyn, New York, Brooklyn Legal Services Corporation A, the North Brooklyn Coalition Against Family Violence, and all organizations that engage in domestic violence prevention and provide outreach and support services for victims of domestic violence. Supports raising awareness about domestic violence and its tragic consequences for women, families, and communities.
